attributes.action: Ensure Parliament Decides on EU Membership reflecting the new Will of The People
attributes.additional_details: Companies across the UK have started the process of cutting jobs.  Others are either curtailing investment or shifting it abroad. We are politically in unchartered waters and consequently need an exceptional response together with proper Leadership.  We call for the likes of David Miliband for Labour, Nicola Sturgeon for SNP, Paddy Ashdown for the Liberals, Philip Hammond for the Conservatives and others to lead that national debate.  Parliament must properly reflect THE WILL OF THE PEOPLE
attributes.background: In the last 72 hours a huge number of voters are now saying they would change their vote to REMAIN if they had the opportunity. Parliament must respect THE WILL OF THE PEOPLE and ensure proper democracy.  Senior politicians of all parties must come together in the interests the UK as a whole
